price: Verkünde den Heuchlern, daß es für sie schmerzhafte Strafe geben wird,
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
